Module chav1961.purelib

Package chav1961.purelib.basic.xsd

This package doesn't contain Java classes (except XSDConst), but has a set XSD schemes to validate different XMLs produced or parsed by the Pure Library classes.

Complete list of the XSD schemes is:

  • CreoleXML.xsd - XML generated by the CreoleWriter class with the MarkupOutputFormat.XML type
  • CreoleXMLFO.xsd - unofficial XML for XML FOP format generated by the CreoleWriter class with the MarkupOutputFormat.XML2PDF type
  • SVG_restricted.xsd - restricted XML to use in SVGParser class
  • XMLBasedParser.xsd - XML to describe XMLBasedParserText functionality
  • XMLLocalizerContent.xsd - XML to describe content of XMLLocalizer class
  • XMLReadOnlyFSys.xsd - XML to describe content of FileSystemOnXMLReadOnly file system

To get access to the XML schemes, you can use XSDConst class as an anchor to them (see the class description for details)

Since:
0.0.2
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
LastUpdate:
0.0.3
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    XSDConst
    This class can be used as an anchor to get access to the XSD schemes inside the package.
